author: adewit
body:
#### PR description:
This make condor submission default for the MillePede alignment algorithm. Also removes code that tries to access LSF. 
No dependencies other than the alignment job submission

#### PR validation:
Full workflow has been tested. The unit tests should not be affected.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
Not a backport
title: TkAl MillePede: Make condor submission default
